title: Ep. - 450 - BEHIND REALITY TV CASTING SISTER WIVES REUNION REAL HOUSEWIVES OF SALT LAKE CITY REVIEW WITH BRIAN MOYLAN
description:
Stacey Noelle Connor, reality TV casting producer and co-host of the Pretty Corrupt discusses behind the scenes of reality tv casting and the finale of the Sister Wives reunion.

 

Author Brian Moylan reviews the season finale of Real Housewives of Salt Lake City.

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey
